page.title: 04Leisure Time
page.content: Young people in the area have the opportunity to swim in the Tower pool.There are facilities for tennis, squash,bowls and putting.Private clubs are engaged in football,sailing,golf, rugby,cricket and hockey. The Regal Cinema has a change of programme weekly.It is also used as a Bingo Hall for over 18 year olds.The current cinema admission price is Â£2 for over 12 year olds and Â£1.25 for children.It is really better value to rent a video for about Â£1.50 a night. More and more people are renting or buying video recorders.
